testsuite.test:
Callback onCameraCaptured triggered
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Creates a file
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Error during capture should pass undefined to onCameraCaptured
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Proper return value from startVideoCapture
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Invalid destination path throw INVALID PARAMETER
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

lowRes
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO'. 2) A movie of about 3 seconds length will be recorded. 3) This movie will be opened in the movie player. 4) Please start the movie there and verify it's the one you recorded!
Expected behaviour: Did the movie you had just taken open?

lowRes verify the stored file
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

hiRes verify the stored file
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

hiRes
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO'. 2) A movie of about 3 seconds length will be recorded. 3) This movie will be opened in the movie player. 4) Please start the movie there and verify it's the one you recorded!
Expected behaviour: Did the high resolution movie you had just taken open?

Controls shown
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Did you see the video recorder controls (e.g. play, pause, ...)?

stopVideoCapture after 5 secs
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO' to start recording 2) Recording should stop after 5 seconds.
Expected behaviour: Did the video recording stop after about 5 secs?
